channel.title: Emotes Teleing
channel.description:
How do i make it so that way i can tele using emotes? like fally, varrock bla bla...
Omfgbbqsauce

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

                    case 185:               //clicking most buttons
	actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
                            if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("dno"))
                            println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId);
			switch(actionButtonId) {
				//These values speak for themselves
				//case 4126: windstrike break;

it says this i see no x tele y tele so i can make it tele them.

Read full topic

item.description:

lol rep++ to who can just explain what the hell is going on

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

I screwed up.
That’s not what you need…
To get the case number of the button, click on it, and in your prompt it’ll say the case ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

  case 164:
                  int actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
	      sendMessage("Case 164: "+actionButtonId);
                  switch(actionButtonId) {
			case 28164:
				teleportToX = 3093;
				teleportToY = 3491;
			break;

I have that i just dont know what to put for this “case 28164:”

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Find case 185, and add this under the frame

case #: //STUFF break;
Add what you need in the place of //STUFF, and the # is the action button ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

[quote=“Newb 2341, post:7, topic:148084”]Frames are not what you need.
I attached a list of action buttons, which you can convert in to emote cases, at the bottom of my post.[/quote]

Thats what im asking how DO I do this.

I dont want you to tell me everything cause i want to learn but im a little confused right now.

Read full topic

@Newb_2341 wrote:

Frames are not what you need.
I attached a list of action buttons, which you can convert in to emote cases, at the bottom of my post.

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

Now where do i add this?i tryed adding yours but nothing happened.

What does the “178” stand for? cause im looking at some other sendframes they say this sendFrame126("", 1132); //Wire

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes Teleing
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“omfgbbqsauce, post:4, topic:148084”][quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=202959.msg1793109#msg1793109 date=1191229838]

Make a case for them.
[/quote] If you do not know how to add the case here is how:

this is one of mine, sendFrame126("@bla@Jad", 178); the 178 is your case number.

Okay now im asking, where would i find a case number?like for edge or fally?[/quote]

Find the existing emote thats in that spot, and use that case and re name it.

Read full topic
